text: Bang the Drum Slowly is a 1973 sports drama movie directed by John D. Hancock and stars Robert De Niro, Michael Moriarty, Vincent Gardenia and Danny Aiello in his cinematic debut. It is based on the 1956 novel of the same name by Mark Harris and earned one Oscar nomination for Vincent Gardenia. == Other websites == * * * * Category:1973 drama movies Category:1970s sports movies Category:American sports drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Baseball movies Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies set in New York City Category:1970s English-language movies Category:1970s American drama movies Category:American buddy movies Category:Buddy drama movies
